TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TickPlacement extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the position of tick marks in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> control with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> that the control implements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The TickPlacement enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that has tick marks that are located below the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>. In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property is set to F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement.BottomRight?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
**Slider Example**
![Slider illustration](../../add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration")
## Examples The following example shows how to set the P:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True property for a T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True control.
[!code-xml[Slider#4](../../add/codesnippet/Xaml/slider_xaml/window1.xaml#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement Both = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Tick marks appear above and below the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True bar for a horizontal T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, or to the left and right of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True for a vertical T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement BottomRight = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Tick marks appear below the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True for a horizontal T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, or to the right of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True for a vertical T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement TopLeft = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Tick marks appear above the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True for a horizontal T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, or to the left of the T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True for a vertical T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
